if(NOT TARGET catch2-includes)
    add_library(catch2-includes INTERFACE)
    add_library(catch2::includes ALIAS catch2-includes)
    target_include_directories(catch2-includes INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
endif()

if(NOT TARGET catch2-main)
    add_library(catch2-main STATIC main.cpp)
    add_library(catch2::main ALIAS catch2-main)
    target_compile_definitions(catch2-main PRIVATE CATCH_CONFIG_MAIN)
    target_link_libraries(catch2-main PUBLIC catch2::includes)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET catch2-runner)
    add_library(catch2-runner STATIC runner.cpp)
    add_library(catch2::runner ALIAS catch2-runner)
    target_compile_definitions(catch2-runner PRIVATE CATCH_CONFIG_RUNNER)
    target_link_libraries(catch2-runner PUBLIC catch2::includes)
endif()
